sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Speex package provides speexdec, speexenc and libspeex.

sect3.title: speexdec
sect3.para: speexdec decodes a Speex file and produces a WAV or raw file.

sect3.title: speexenc
sect3.para: speexenc encodes a WAV or raw files using Speex.

sect3.title: libspeex
sect3.para: libspeex provides functions for the audio encoding/decoding programs.
